title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-17] [$250] [Held requests] Incorrectly showing the held confirmation modal for one expense report
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Prerequisite: Create a Collect workspace as user A, invite user B and configure to submit to user A
1. As user B create an expense
2. As user A, hold user B’s expense
3. Approve the report

Expected result: Hold confirmation modal should not be displayed in the case of only one expense

Actual result: None
